thread.title: Have you seen this missing man? | Central
thread.title_full: Have you seen this missing man? | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Have you seen this missing man? | Central
text:
Police are appealing for information to trace a 75-year-old man who has gone missing from Sandwell.
Bernard Thomson went missing from his home in Cradley Heath at around 10am this morning and officers are concerned for his well-being.
Bernard is described as 5ft 8ins tall, slim build with long grey hair that is swept back and Hazel eyes.
He was last seen wearing a grey jumper and blue jeans and a pair of glasses.
Sergeant Vicky Basterfield, from Sandwell Police, said:
"We are urgently trying to trace Bernard and would ask him to get in touch so we know he is safe and well. We would also ask anyone who may have seen Bernard to contact us as soon as possible."
â€“ Sergeant Vicky Basterfield. Anyone with information can call 101 or Missing People on 116 000.
Last updated Tue 31 Jan 2017 West Midlands Sandwell
